title: Updating the theme
content:
Updating the Shadcn theme in your Makerkit ApplicationHow to update the theme in your Makerkit application

Makerkit uses Shadcn UI and it defines the theme according to its guidelines.You can find the default theme inside the application at apps/web/styles/global.css.If you want to override the default style, either define your own colors or pick a theme from the Shadcn Themes page, and copy/paste the theme into this file.
